offer heading: Up to 22% OFF on Batik Air Flights to Kuala Lumpur
offer subheading/description: Book flights to Kuala Lumpur with Batik Air and enjoy up to 22% discount on fares. Limited period offer for travel from India.

offer heading: Flat 20% Off on Air India Express Flights
offer subheading/description: Get flat 20% off on Air India Express bookings. Book till 14 May 2025 and save on your next trip.

offer heading: Early Bird Discounts on Europe 2025 Tours
offer subheading/description: Unlock unbeatable early bird discounts on SOTC’s 2025 Europe tour packages. Book early for the best prices and extra benefits.

offer heading: All-Inclusive Europe Packages up to 28% Off
offer subheading/description: Book Europe tour packages with Thomas Cook and get up to 28% off. EMI options available, covering top destinations like Paris, Zurich, and London.

offer heading: Group & Customised Holiday Deals from Veena World
offer subheading/description: Choose from 2500+ group tours or get a customised holiday at special prices. Departures from major Indian cities.

offer heading: Free Universal Travel Adapter on International Flights
offer subheading/description: Book international flights with EaseMyTrip and get a free universal travel adapter. Use promocode EMTPOWER.

offer heading: Special Student Offer: Extra Baggage Allowance
offer subheading/description: Students get extra baggage allowance on select flights booked via EaseMyTrip. Ideal for study abroad and international students.

offer heading: International Holidays with Yatra – Best Deals
offer subheading/description: Book domestic and international holiday packages with Yatra. Enjoy special discounts on curated tours worldwide.

offer heading: Up to 15% OFF on Air Arabia Round-Trip Flights
offer subheading/description: Book Air Arabia round-trip flights from India and enjoy up to 15% off. Limited period offer.

offer heading: Special Fares on Lufthansa Airlines with EaseMyTrip
offer subheading/description: Book Lufthansa Airlines via EaseMyTrip and unlock special fares on select routes. Limited seats available.
